alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:35AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1135 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florida A And M, or near Tallahassee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Springsax Park, Belair, Ralford Greenway, Apalachee Regional Park, Cody, Indian Head Acres, Gaither Community Center, Chaires Crossroads, Lake Munson, Lutterloh, Eight Mile Pond, Capitola, Chaires, Southwood, North Florida Fairgrounds, Wacissa, Lloyd and Wacissa Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
